sense.def:
To suck something
pomeni držati nekaj z usti in vleči z ličnicami in jezikom, ponavadi zato, da iz tistega potegnemo tekočino.

seg.quote: The baby went on sucking the bottle.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
sucks an object or liquid somewhere
, z veliko silo nekam potegne kak predmet ali tekočino.

seg.quote: The water is sucked upwards through the roots.
